= Introduction =

This is list of feature that are currently missing in ICAT API but they are easy to be exposed and will be available on next release.


= Details =

1) RelatedDatafiles (done on test server) : Get/Set the list of datafiles related to another files
2) Users : Search and get the user id of a scientist using surname or firstname. useful in giving permissions.
3) Cycles : Get the list of experiment cycles.
4) AdvancedSearch Sorting : Sorting option in the advanced search.
